title: SOLD: The Encylopedia of Baseball Cards Vol 1 - 19th Century
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: SOLD: The Encylopedia of Baseball Cards Vol 1 - 19th Century
posts.post_content:
I am reorganizing my hobby library and making some of my duplicate publications available.

138 page book from 1983 by Lew Lipset. The back cover has a corner crease, but is in otherwise excellent condition. Binding is tight and there is no writing or highlighting.  

This is an essential book for any vintage collector's library that covers virtually all of the 19th century baseball card issues in depth.

$SOLD delivered in the US via USPS Media Mail. 

PayPal FF, Venmo FF or a check is fine.
Hi I'll take this if it is still available

[quote name="Oulixeus" post=2455733]Hi I'll take this if it is still available[/QUOTE]

It is. I will PM you.
